SELECT cl.log_id AS logId, cl.type_description AS typeDescription, cl.order_status AS orderStatus, cl.ip AS ip, cl.exchangeable_cash_amount AS exchangeableCashAmount, cl.create_time AS createTime, u.UserName AS username, u.Telephone AS telphone, u.Email AS email, cl.pay_user_id AS payUserId FROM inf_cash_log AS cl , sys_user AS u WHERE cl.pay_user_id = u.UserId AND cl.type_description = 2100 ORDER BY cl.order_status ASC, cl.create_time DESC
